A TRUE masterpiece. this game redefines the puzzle genre. with the editor included, i have spent so much time on this game, whether it be speedrunning, building, or playing it casually, this game took me by storm. after beating the first portal game, i knew there was a sequel, but until i bought it i didnt understand what it could possibly bring that wasnt on the table already. a nonviolent fps was so neat, BUT NOW THERES WHEATLY, AND ALL SORTS OF COOL CRAP i didnt even think of. the development team behind this game put so much detail into it, that the replay value is insane. i wish i could give this a higher rating, like an 11/10 or 2 reccomendations, but if youre into puzzles, fps, stories, dystopian, scifi, or any other genre like that, this game will blow your mind.
Moy Bueeeno

Портал - игра на вашу логику, мышление и понимание черного юмора и сарказма. Прыгай, бегай, телепортируйся и не умирай. Вы - девушка из Apertune Labaratories, которая собирается выбраться наружу с помощью нового друга. Выслушав 20 минутную болтовню этого " умникона" вы наконец чувствуете облегчение тишины и покоя. Все бы ничего, но у вас теперь есть новый друг - Картошка! А теперь включаем не только логику для вашей пушки, но и для того что бы понять вашу Картошку! Приятной игры)

I don't really have any complaints on the game, it's simple but also complex in its own amazing way, the game is overall fun and I recommend it, a cheap good lasting game. Truly a classic. Recommended.

A more advanced version of placing the correct shapes in the correct hole. Jump, Crash and Portal back into the past (or just a deeper level of the facility) as you learn how to cover every Surface insight with as much White sticky liquid then use the orange one to make everything bouncy. Honestly it's a lot of fun and I recommend Everyone play it so I can do multiplayer.

Fabuła:
Kontynuacja przygód Chell w opuszczonym Koncepcie Badawczym Aperture Science 

Ocena SinglePlayer:
Single bardzo zróżnicowany pod względem tego jak wyglądał Single w pierwszym Portalu 

Ocena Co-op'a:
Według mnie: Dobre Dobre
Według Śniega: Chujowe

Zalety:
-Grafika starego Source'a jest lepsza niż w Half-Life i porównywalna do Team Fortress'a 2
-Lepszy niż pierwszy Portal 

Wady:
-Mało kto gra w Co-op'a
-Gra zbyt prosta
-Jeżeli chcesz grać Co-op'a to musisz mieć znajomego do tego

Ocena:9,5/10

Man I ended up playing this game REAL late, but I'd say it's easily one of my top 10, maybe even top 5 favorite video games of all time now. The first Portal was solid and a trailblazer for video games in general, but the main flaws of the original in my opinion were 1. it was rather short, 2. the story wasn't quite as "there" as it could've been, and 3. it didn't have co-op. This game improves upon the original in every way, from the inclusion of a co-op mode to having a much longer single player story, which is honestly fantastic by the way. It isn't super complex, but it deals with the perfect mix of grand-scale events ala the aftermath of the cataclysm in Half-Life, and small personal conflicts like the ballad of Cave Johnson and the origin of GLaDOS, and it sets up some absolutely fantastic environments for the single player levels. It starts out very similar to the first game, but hopefully without spoiling anything I'll just say you "dive into the past" so to speak, and it just feels so unique and spectacular and you just have to play it to see. It also introduces some great new puzzle elements (the goo is particularly fun), which gives it just about the perfect amount of depth when you get towards the end. All in all a game everybody should absolutely play (but play the original Portal first if you haven't, it's still worth completing too), and whether it's likely to happen or not I'm going to have my fingers crossed for a Portal 3 for as long as it takes.
Another masterpiece made by Valve. Just buy it without thinking.

I wonder if any of this backstory existed when the first one was created. It is a nice mix of prequel and sequel (an equel?) and I found it just as interesting, enjoyable, and funny as the original.  I look forward to (and hope for) Portal 2 Episode 2 sometime before my untimely death.

Une très bonne suite du premier opus, portal 2 est LE jeu qui vous fera passer les heures à une vitesse folle. Des dialogues bien écris, drôles, constructifs et surtout bien placés. Vous ne vous ennuierez pas dans ce jeu. De plus ce n'est pas un casse tête ou vous resterez coincé pendant des heures à chercher une solution. Non, c'est plutôt dynamique, instinctif et prenant
